#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;



int main()
{
    int t,n,p,temp2;
    string temp;
    cin>>t;
    while(t>0){
    	cin>>n;
    	cin>>temp;
    	cin>>p;
    	if(temp=="odd"){
    		cout<<2+(2*(p-1))<<'\n';
